subject_information.address: 49331 Lewis Views Apt. 516, Lake Maryshire, DE 59549

suspicious_activity.narrative: From February to July 2025, Jacqueline Rodriguez (ID: CUST_0111) received a large incoming wire transfer of $76,517.25. This was followed by multiple outgoing transfers below the $10,000 reporting threshold, totaling $49,517.51. The activity appears to be structured to evade BSA/AML reporting requirements.
suspicious_activity.ai_reasoning: Customer's account shows a large incoming wire transfer of $76,517.25 followed by multiple outgoing wire transfers just below $10,000, which indicates a potential structuring activity to avoid reporting requirements.
